text: Ni appointed angxel est guardians Infer ni asign their numer (19) (1) disturb disbelievers (2) konvink Christians Jud this est divine scripture) (3) strengthen faith de fidel (4) remove all spur de dub kor Christians Jud tro believers (5) expose those haven dub their kor disbelievers; ili dir Ki did DI mean this allegory? DI do send astray whomever Li vol kaj direkt whomever Li vol! Neniom kon soldat your Lord escept Li! This est reminder popol
